name: Arena Stars
description: Choose your Hero, build your Team and take on others in the Arena Stars Universe in this action-packed epic new multiplayer strategy game from Tiny Titan Studios! Arena Stars is a free to play, 1v1 action MOBA for everyone.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or greater Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
